Value.label: Changeover delay (motor protection)
Value.Help: To configure the time (value * 0.1 sec) the motor waits before switching direction.

Value.label: Raising time input 1
Value.Help: To configure input 1 of the raising time calculation (256 * Input 1 + Input 2) * 0.1 sec

Value.label: Raising time input 2
Value.Help: To configure input 1 of the raising time calculation (256 * Input 1 + Input 2) * 0.1 sec

Value.label: Lowering time input 1
Value.Help: To configure input 1 of the lowering time calculation (256 * Input 1 + Input 2) * 0.1 sec

Value.label: Lowering time input 2
Value.Help: To configure input 1 of the lowering time calculation (256 * Input 1 + Input 2) * 0.1 sec
